name: sendMiFareISO7816Command(_:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends an ISO 7816 command APDU to the tag and receives a response APDU.Required. Default implementation provided.
declaration:

            completionHandler: @escaping (Data, UInt8, UInt8, Error?) -> Void)
